+ Generate data

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
```

```{r}
mani = "swiss_roll"
n_exp = 20
fileroot = "G:/HeJunhui/research/2023/exampleEBARS/exampleEBARS/manifold"
# model parameters
I = 3000
D = 3; d = 2
sd = 1.5

embedding_map <- function(x, d) {
  u = isomap(dist(x), ndim=d, k=20)$points
  return(u)
}
```

```{r,include=FALSE}
t.start = Sys.time()
for(rep in 1:n_exp) {
  # generate samples
  theta = runif(I,pi,5*pi)
  x = cbind(3*theta*cos(theta),21*runif(I),3*theta*sin(theta))
  xobs = x + matrix(rnorm(3*I,0,sd),I,3)
  cat("swiss roll noisy samples with dim (", dim(xobs), ")\n")
  write.csv(t(xobs), file=file.path(fileroot, "dataset", mani, paste0(rep,".csv")))
  
  # manifold estimation
  # TSME
  t1 = Sys.time()
  result.ebars = manifold_fitting(xobs, d, embedding_map)
  x.ebars = result.ebars$fitted
  t2 = Sys.time()
  cat(paste0("Trial ",rep," TSME\n"))
  print(t2-t1)
  write.csv(t(x.ebars), file=file.path(fileroot, "output", mani, paste0("tsme_trial",rep,".csv")))
}
t.end = Sys.time()
```

```{r}
print(t.end-t.start)
```
